meanings.definition: The quality or state of being supernormal.
meanings.sent1: Her belief in supernormalities made her stand out from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the supernormalities of the rare species of birds.
meanings.sent3: The detective's reliance on supernormalities to solve the case added a fun twist to the story.
meanings.sent4: The artist's creativity reached supernormalities, inspiring awe in all who saw her work.
meanings.sent5: The supernormalities of the magical world in the book made it a captivating read.

meanings.sent1: The superhero's supernormalities allowed him to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's supernormalities on the field amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's ability to make everyone laugh seemed like a supernormality.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a supernormality that brightened the lives of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's discovery of the new element was a supernormality in the world of chemistry.
